archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Revocation
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: The act of an Issuer revoking the validity of a Claim or a Credential. With the Sovrin Protocol and the Sovrin Ledger, Revocation is accomplished using a Revocation Registry.
